instruction: Show me all connections from a specific internal IP address
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_conn id.orig_h="192.168.1.100" | table _time id.orig_h id.resp_h id.resp_p proto service

instruction: Find all outbound connections on port 443
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_conn id.resp_p=443 | table _time id.orig_h id.resp_h proto

instruction: List the top 10 destination IPs by connection count
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_conn | stats count by id.resp_h | sort -count | head 10

instruction: Show me all failed connection attempts
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_conn conn_state="S0" | table _time id.orig_h id.resp_h id.resp_p

instruction: Display connections with large data transfers
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_conn orig_bytes>10485760 | table _time id.orig_h id.resp_h orig_bytes resp_bytes

instruction: Find all SSH connections in the last hour
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_conn service="ssh" earliest=-1h | table _time id.orig_h id.resp_h

instruction: Show connections lasting longer than 10 minutes
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_conn duration>600 | table _time id.orig_h id.resp_h duration service

instruction: List all unique services seen on the network
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_conn | stats count by service | sort service

instruction: Find connections to high-numbered ports
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_conn id.resp_p>10000 | table _time id.orig_h id.resp_h id.resp_p proto

instruction: Show me all rejected connections
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_conn conn_state="REJ" | table _time id.orig_h id.resp_h id.resp_p

instruction: Show all DNS queries for a specific domain
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_dns query="example.com" | table _time id.orig_h query answers

instruction: Find all NXDOMAIN responses
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_dns rcode_name="NXDOMAIN" | table _time id.orig_h query

instruction: List the top 10 most queried domains
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_dns | stats count by query | sort -count | head 10

instruction: Show DNS queries from a specific internal host
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_dns id.orig_h="192.168.1.50" | table _time query answers

instruction: Find all TXT record queries
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_dns qtype_name="TXT" | table _time id.orig_h query answers

instruction: Display all DNS queries with no answers
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_dns rcode_name="SERVFAIL" | table _time id.orig_h query

instruction: Show me all MX record lookups
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_dns qtype_name="MX" | table _time id.orig_h query answers

instruction: Find queries to a specific DNS server
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_dns id.resp_h="8.8.8.8" | table _time id.orig_h query answers

instruction: List all unique DNS query types
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_dns | stats count by qtype_name | sort -count

instruction: Show PTR reverse lookup queries
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_dns qtype_name="PTR" | table _time id.orig_h query answers

instruction: Show all HTTP requests to a specific host
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_http host="example.com" | table _time id.orig_h method uri

instruction: Find all HTTP POST requests
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_http method="POST" | table _time id.orig_h host uri

instruction: Display all 404 errors
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_http status_code=404 | table _time id.orig_h host uri

instruction: Show all 500 series server errors
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_http status_code>=500 | table _time id.orig_h host uri status_code

instruction: List top 10 user agents
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_http | stats count by user_agent | sort -count | head 10

instruction: Find requests with large request bodies
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_http request_body_len>1048576 | table _time id.orig_h host uri request_body_len

instruction: Show all requests to admin paths
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_http uri="*/admin*" | table _time id.orig_h host uri method

instruction: Display successful GET requests
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_http method="GET" status_code=200 | table _time id.orig_h host uri

instruction: Find all requests with specific referrer
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_http referrer="*google*" | table _time id.orig_h host uri referrer

instruction: Show HTTP requests from internal network
output: index=zeek sourcetype=zeek_http id.orig_h="192.168.*" | table _time id.orig_h host uri method
